question.content: ……… in universities around the nation has more than tripled compared to this time last year.
……… Mr. Pennington retires, he will receive an annual pension of more than fifty thousand dollars from Packard Incorporated.
……… MR. Bingham’s promotion became official, many of his colleagues have approached him to congratulate him.
John Clarke, who is in the prime of his career, has been ranked ……… the top 10 players in tennis history by Sport Daily.
Due to the heavy damage the storm has caused in some rural areas, it is predicted that the cost of fruits and vegetables will be ……… this summer.
ll of our stores will be extending their business hours during the holiday season, but we will go back to our ……… hours after the New Year.
Sara Ewing received rave ……… for her outstanding performance in her portrayal of a single mother raising two children in the ghetto in the 70s in the new blockbuster movie Single Mom.
Bad Boys Electrics Store found ……… under increased media attention after its manager was indicted for embezzling an undisclosed amount of money.
Some of our clients have complained that the time it takes to get a ……… from a service representative is enough to make them not want to use our services again.
After a long and gruesome season, Jeff Willis has been performing ……… better since the playoff started a week ago.
